phrases: hajimete no kimochi my first feelings
shonbori no mune ni upon my downhearted chest
sotto nagerareta hidamarine a sunny ray of light was gently thrown
sora miageta toki when I looked up at the sky,
haru ga soko ni kiteta spring was near,
kowareru omoi wa these trembling feelings are
sukininatte iino is it okay for me to fall in love?
tamerau kokoro ga my hesitating heart
bureiki kakerukedo put on my brakes,
ikiga tomarisou desu I cannot breathe
It is been a while since I have stopped caring about the changing of the seasons.
Please wait for the express train, it will come after...
How much meaning is there to the fact that it is spring right now?
There is someone else I have fallen in love with.
Please wait until the train comes to a complete stop.
Excuse me, I am getting off.
I am so out of it.
That is all I have about the next arranged marriage party.
If you do not have any particular questions, then I would like to end the meeting.
This party is restricted to members in their late 20's to early 30's.
However, someday I hope to bring down the membership age to mid-teens,
and have a party restricted to women in their teens...
Where do you want to go?
Did not a new restaurant open up in Kanami?
You are sorting the membership data files in the back today.
I cannot show that to customers.
There should definitely be a demand.
From experience, even men my age can only meet teenage girls in an unlawful way.
Are not there any opportunities to meet a female high school student?
I did not hear about this!
Anyway, you are going to live with Nanoka starting tomorrow night.
I wanted to show you Nanoka.
You do not remember her, do you?
I do, but I do not remember her face.
She is a freshman in high school now.
Everyone commutes from far away nowadays.
She can cut her commute time from two hours to one!
Is not it natural that you let her stay?
Just because you got dumped by your lover,
you do not intend on getting back together with mom, do you?
That is not how it is!
With my carefree life living with pop,
sometimes there is something I forget about.
I have a mother and a sister who is 12 years younger.
What the hell are you thinking?
Why were you hiding such an important thing from me?!
It is basically like I do not know about it.
I met my mom, who took custody of her, a couple times.
But I have not seen my sister at all.
What kind of partner are you interested in?
I am sorry I came while you are working.
It is my lunch break anyway.
I came to get the keys to my place back.
I thought it would be better during the day.
You are really letting me go easy.
Oh, this is all I meant to you.
Koshiro, have you ever loved anyone from the bottom of your heart?
Koshiro, have you ever loved anyone from the bottom of your heart?
Then what should I have done?
During the party, we are planning to have three events,
so if we could divide the food and have it brought out to match the timing...
If you would like it, it is next door.
Do not mind if I do.
What do I say to a woman that says she has another man...?
It is a place that kind of hurts for a bachelor.
You are so cool about it...
That is what she dislikes about me.
Here, I will give these to you.
Why do not you try inviting that girl you broke up with?
Maybe you guys will get back together?
Who the hell's going to get back together with...
That is not what it is!
Then, I am sorry I am interrupting your date.
I was waiting to meet a someone,
but I came too early and I needed to kill time.
What would you like to ride?
What the hell am I doing?
It must be boring with me.
Do not you have a boyfriend?
I just broke up with him.
I received it during my junior high graduation
But it was not his second button.
I liked him since I was a first-year.
It is not like he is really handsome or anything...
I gathered up all my courage and confessed to him but...
He said he is going out with a junior at school.
I did not know that at all.
If the window could open, I could throw it out from here...
Do not say you are going to throw it away.
You still like him, do not you?
Then do not say that you are going to throw it away.
I have to forget about him.
He has someone that he is going out with.
We go to different high schools,
and it is not like I will ever get to see him again.
Why do you say such things?
How can you love someone so straightforward like that?
Well, it is really different from your situation.
and I do not really know if I really loved her anymore.
the feelings that you have inside you.
Ever since I got rejected, I kept walking with my head down,
so I did not notice the flowers blooming at all.
When you called me back at the train station,
I noticed it for the first time.
The petals were falling like snow,
and for a moment I could not tell where I was.
That is the same for me too.
this place that I have always been at?
Oh, you are here too, Koshiro?
It is been a while since you siblings have gotten together.
Did you guys notice right after you met each other?
Hey, what is wrong with the two of you?
What should we have for dinner?
yasashii yume ga a gentle dream
sotto mune no haru wo yobi calls the spring in my heart
yasashii kaze ni nari and becomes a gentle breeze
kimi ni furete satteyuku that touches you then leaves
chiisana potto ni wa in the small pot
daisukina kimochi are feelings of love
ii kaori nosete that carry a sweet scent
kono toki wo atatamete warming up this moment...
futari dakara wakaru koto things we understand because it is the two of us
kotoba janakute are not just words
hohoemu dake negaudake we just smile, we just hope
shizuka na sora e to the quiet sky
ashita mo mata aeru yo ne we will see each other again tomorrow...
shizuka na sora de at the quiet sky
A girl that I got dumped by came to my office, so I was kind of apprehensive.
I went on a date with my younger sister without knowing.
I cried in front of a high school student at my age.
